name: SpaceMiner
description:
SpaceMiner is my entry for the #GBJam 5

Your mission is to collect as many rock material as you can before you die, your fire power will be increased as you collect rocks, also you can use a giant laser that can be recharged taking shiny cristals.

Use ARROWS or AWSD keys to MOVE
Press "Z" to shoot the primary weapon
Press "X" to shoot the giant laser
Press "SPACE BAR" to start and pause game

Press "C" to change COLOR mode
Press "V" to change WINDOW SIZE
Press "ESC" to reset the game

Gamepad supported! (Fixed dead zone issues)
